tests.title: should connect to database
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Database should connect to database

tests.title: should have table `Users` in database
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Database should have table `Users` in database

tests.title: invalid userId or password request should respond with message 'not authorized'
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ POST /users/login invalid userId or password request should respond with message 'not authorized'

tests.title: valid userId and password request should respond with message 'ok'
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ POST /users/login valid userId and password request should respond with message 'ok'

tests.title: connect.sid cookie value should be set as encrypted value while using express-session
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ POST /users/login connect.sid cookie value should be set as encrypted value while using express-session

tests.title: cookies should have Secure and SameSite option
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ POST /users/login cookies should have Secure and SameSite option

tests.title: should return 200 status code after logout successfully
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ POST /users/logout should return 200 status code after logout successfully

tests.title: should return 200 status code when requested with a valid cookie
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ GET /users/userinfo should return 200 status code when requested with a valid cookie

tests.title: should return 400 status code when requested without a cookie
tests.fullTitle: Authentication - Server Authentication - Server ⛳️ GET /users/userinfo should return 400 status code when requested without a cookie
